General.Name: Shaanxi Broadcast & TV Network Intermediary Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Broadcast & TV Network Intermediary(Group)Co.,Ltd. engages in planning, shooting, production, and distribution of radio and television programs in China. It is also involved in cable and wireless digital tv operation, TV shopping, mobile TV, film and television drama investment, and advertising management. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.
